text: The War Room, is a five-track EP from Public Service Broadcasting. The EP is dedicated to J. Willgoose, Esq's great-uncle George Willgoose who died at Dunkirk. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== * J. Willgoose, Esq. - Banjo, Electronics, Guitar, Sampling * Stephen Hackshaw - Strings * Wrigglesworth - Drums, Electronics, Piano * Barry Gardner - Mastering * Charlie Thomas - Drum Engineering ==References== Category:2012 EPs Category:Public Service Broadcasting (band) albums
title: The War Room (EP)
